title: A breathable inorganicâ€“organic interface for fabricating a crack-free nickel-rich cathode with long-term stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01254B, Paper
Yipeng Sun, Jinjin Ma, Duojie Wu, Changhong Wang, Yang Zhao, Matthew Zheng, Ruizhi Yu, Weihan Li, Minsi Li, Yingjie Gao, Xiaoting Lin, Hui Duan, Jiamin Fu, Zhiqiang Wang, Ruying Li, M. Danny Gu, Tsun-Kong Sham, Xueliang Sun
A thin molecular level surface modification layer is constructed for a nickel-rich layered oxide cathode to boost long-term cycling stability.
